category.name: zoo.window.bank
category.item: Those who manage well will prosper! Buy valuable zoodollars at the zoo bank or take advantage of our attractive Premium offers!
Running low on in-game currency? That can happen! Those who want to succeed need to invest!
Use Premium benefits to attract more visitors to your zoo. Give it a try!
Don't want to do everything on your own? No problem! Zoo assistants will help you!
